sentences.en: " Live and die your own way, unnoticed.
sentences.cn: “ 悄悄的活下来,悄悄的死去, 啊!

sentences.en: Elsa stood unnoticed at the edge of the crowd.
sentences.cn: 埃尔莎悄悄地站在人群边上。

sentences.en: For pictures of people behaving naturally, not posing for the camera, it is essential to shoot unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 要拍出不专门摆姿势、举止自然的人物照片，抓拍是关键。

sentences.en: He was in too gracious a mood to pass her by unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 他正心情欢畅,所以不会走过她而不加注意的.

sentences.en: Her forty-fourth birthday had just passed, unnoticed by all but herself.
sentences.cn: 她44岁的生日就这样过去了，除了她自己没人注意到。

sentences.en: His kindness did not go unnoticed by his staff.
sentences.cn: 他的厚道员工了然于心。

sentences.en: I can't let this act of kindness go unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 我不能让这种好人好事湮没无闻.

sentences.en: I slipped from the room unseen, ie unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 我悄悄地溜出房间, 无人察觉.

sentences.en: I tried to slip up the stairs unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 我试图趁没人注意溜上楼去。
我的缺席未能引起人家注意.

sentences.en: Not only are mothers not paid but also most of their boring or difficult work is unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 母亲们不但得不到报酬，而且她们做的那些乏味艰苦的工作常常都不为人所注意。

sentences.en: She scorns the visible trappings of success, preferring to live unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 她鄙视标志成功的外在之物, 更愿意默默无闻地生活.

sentences.en: That way, he could be virtually unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 那样, 他就根本不会受到注意.

sentences.en: The cocktails were so sweet that the strength of them might pass unnoticed until it was too late.
sentences.cn: 这些鸡尾酒太好喝了，等你感受到酒劲时可能为时已晚。

sentences.en: The thick fog enable him to climbd up the hill unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 浓雾使他能爬上山去不被别人发觉.

trans.tran_cn: 未被觉察到的，未被注意到的，不受人注意的，被忽视的，没人理睬的
